Looking directly ahead of you, Bolt has his head facing the ground so you can see the floor. As you looked down into the esophagus, all you could see was darkness. Regardless of what was going to happen to you, it wasn't an ideal situation for you and your dog.

Droplets of saliva hits you in all directions and it was a little unbearable but then you notice something. You slowly become loose from the walls of Bolt's throat. Realizing this, you begin to squirm effortlessly and this worked. A minute later, you were free but then gravity pulled you down. It looked like you were on your way to the stomach but then Bolt started hacking even more as a response to you unexpectedly falling into his throat. Your heart began to race, worrying that you may not make it out in one piece but then you are lift up into the air by the exhaled air from Bolt's fierce cough. Being lifting up by air was completely new to and while you were taken aback, you found yourself on Bolt's tongue again. Once Bolt noticed you were back in his mouth, he slowly released you back onto the floor.

Now covered in thick saliva, you finally had a chance to catch your breath. Bolt took away some of the saliva by playfully licking it off you. This freakish experience made both of you think about how valuable one is the other.

"Chances are, you didn't see that coming and I apologize." Bolt said, referring to when he first sniffed up. He looked down in shame and embarrassed.

"It's okay I actually didn't mind it that much," you said, "just give me a heads up next time."

Bolt's face immediately went up and smiled and he followed that up by giving you more kisses. Feeling a little tired, you asked Bolt, "how about we rest together?" Bolt thought that was a good idea and immediately rested on his side. You choose to walk over to his belly and rest your head next to his abdomen. After getting comfortable, it didn't take very long before you fell asleep.

Following a short nap, you woke up and realize that...
15112.title: Unusual Way to Get Unstuck

choices: try to fight your way back up.
let yourself get swallowed by your best friend.
152.content:
As you crawl along Bolt's nose, you feel the cool air come in and warm air go out with each breath Bolt makes. The wet and slippery walls of his nasal passage is much smoother than the surface of Bolt's nose, so the best you can do is inch along until you reach your spot. Just as your are about to get comfortable, your foot slips and knocks into the side of Bolt's nasal cavity.

You feel your whole world shift as Bolt's head lurches back while he breathes in shortly. You have a bad feeling about what might come next. In one deep breath, you get swept up from your comfy spot and get sent much deeper into Bolt's nose than you've ever been before. Before you can get situated again, Bolt has another involuntary inhale that sends you into the top of his throat.

You get stuck in a mix of mucus and saliva as you shift your body around to get your bearings. Unfortunately, you break free and fall straight down the back of his throat, causing Bolt to accidentally swallow you without having a chance to react. Thankfully, Bolt's swallows don't send you far, but you seem to be stuck until you ---
152.title: Going Too Far

info.brief_description: What happens when you shrink with Bolt?
info.description:
You have the ability to shrink down and have fun with Bolt (Disney)! What will happen when there are [nearly] endless possibilities and all the time in the world to have fun with him?


Feel free to add content! It's open to pretty much anything, though there are just a few rules:

1. Try to keep the interactions to male/male.

2. Bolt is male, no exceptions or sex changes.

3. No death, and therefore, no hard vore, digestion, scat, etc. [Being pooped out, however, is acceptable, but nothing that has to do with feces, just the prey.]

4. All types of vore (besides hard) are allowed.

5. Keep new character additions reasonable; avoid OCs.

6. Entries will be edited, but just for spelling or grammar, not content.

7. No endings, keep the story going.

8. Have fun, this is an open interactive story!

Note: I realize that the first chapter isn't the most creative, but that's not why you read these stories, so I just wanted to write something short to get right into it.


Thanks for reading! I hope you like it and add to it, reviews are welcome!
